message: I propose dividing the money with a ratio of 7:3, favoring you in the first round due to its higher value.
I believe a 7:3 split in my favor is fairer, reflecting the higher value of money for me in this round. Let's get this game started!
Considering the decrease in the value of your money, I propose a 6:4 split. This maintains a favorable balance while acknowledging the reduced purchasing power for you.
